data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 23321, Version Hash: e28e4199f3b4b2e650d0be2d5790cf74b84546a1
data.actual_result: The cursor icon/symbol only changes for the username (words) and not the discord tag (numbers).
data.expected_result: Both the username (words) and the discord tag (#numbers), when hovered over, should change the cursor icon/symbol.
data.short_description: Cursor hover symbol does not change when hovered over tag.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to activity - Have a friend who is playing a game and have it show on the bottom, below the news and announcements - Hover your cursor over the username (letters) - Observe the cursor symbol change from pointer/default to a hand - Click and open profile - Hover your cursor over the discord tag (numbers) - Observe no cursor symbol change from pointer/default - Click and profile should open
